## ScalarOperations.fromComplex() method

Returns an instance of the scalar type from its real and imaginary parts. If the scalar type does not support complex numbers, then an error will be thrown.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fromComplex(real: number, imaginary: number): S;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  real | <code>number</code> |  |
|  imaginary | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`S`

The scalar
